oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Songwriter Session - Rob Crosby and Mitchell Tenpenny - 2017-05-27
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: Performance by Rob Crosby and Mitchell Tenpenny from the Ford Theater at the Country Music Hall of Fame and Museum on May 27, 2017. Includes questions from the audience.
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:creator: Rob Crosby; Mitchell Tenpenny;
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dcterms:tableOfContents: (00:00) Opening comments and songwriters introduction by Abi Tapia / (04:00) Opening comments and introduction of next song / (04:39) Mixed Drinks (Mitchell Tenpenny) / (08:34) Introduction of next song / (10:06) Holdin' A Good Hand (Rob Crosby) / (12:30) Introduction of next song / (13:06) Telling All My Secrets (Mitchell Tenpenny) / (17:01) Introduction of next song / (18:22) Concrete Angel (Rob Crosby) / (22:31) Introduction of next song / (23:10) Drunk Me (Mitchell Tenpenny) / (27:17) Rob answers question about maintaining the inspiration to write songs everyday / (28:27) Introduction of next song / (30:43) Friday Night (Rob Crosby) / (33:10) Introduces next song / (34:14) The Truck I Drove (Mitchell Tenpenny) / (37:10) Introduction of next song / (40:09) Rise Above It (Rob Crosby) / (43:12) Introduction of next song / (44:10) If The Boot Fits (Mitchell Tenpenny) / (46:46) Closing comments / (47:05) Walk-out music / (50:03) FILE END
